name: Droseraceae Rampage
description:
Controls: Left and Right arrow keys to move, Up arrow key or Z to jump, X to interact, P to pause, M to mute.

A weird little game I've been working on alongside a larger project, I wish I'd finished this a month or so earlier since I'm sure a lot of people are still getting over their post Halloween skeleton fatigue.

Downloadable versions of all my games are now available for windows here.

https://sigilcipher.itch.io/four-strange-games-by-sigil
